pullRequest.title: DEV-1153 Add HG 38 Support
pullRequest.bodyText:
I just pushed my branch back to master - DEV-1153 - so feel free to look at the changes. They all revolve around:

optionally providing a ref genome version argument to the pipeline, with default of HG37
adding in a layer in many of the resource sub-directories to store the files for each version
adding an interface to get resource files which handles this versioning under the hood (not bonnet)

commit.message:
Added enum for ref genome version (37 or 38)
Added ref genome specific resource classes
Added ref_genome_version to common pipeline arguments
Pass ref-genome resource class to Linx
Added other HG38 resource file names and interface methods
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/hartwigmedical/pipeline5 into DEV-1153
Set version-specific references, updated Amber
Updated cobalt to use ref-genome resource
Sage, GermlineCaller and SomaticCaller now use ref-genome resource
Converted VmAligner, SnpGenotype and Bachelor to use ref-genome resource files
Changed Resource to ResourceFiles to better represent its function
Converted all remaining refs to REFERENCE_GENOME_FASTA to the HG37 file
Removed DBSNP annotations
Merged and resolved conflict in ref genome import
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/hartwigmedical/pipeline5 into DEV-1153
Added ref genome version sub-directory to resource buckets
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/hartwigmedical/pipeline5 into DEV-1153
Parse ref genome version from command line
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/hartwigmedical/pipeline5 into DEV-1153
SnpEff database version now set in Resource Files for HG 37 & 38
Added gridss blacklist bed file to ref-genomic-specific list
Fixed HG38 version of SnpEff DB, added temporary ref-genome file rename for GRIDSS
Merged in lastest changes, resolved conflicts

nodes.bodyText: This necessary still? The resources in the image are static we should just be able to set this up exactly how we want it and remove the need for checking files and copying.

commit.message: DEV-1153: Rename amber pon to loci to not be confused with other pons
DEV-1153: Added giabHighConfidenceBed to resource files
DEV-1153: Removed resource only used for old sage with no hg38 support

nodes.bodyText: Not sure why there is public static method. I think it makes more sense for the batch applications to access this via the ResourcesFilesFactory same as the normal pipeline.

Start curly brace should be on previous line. Same for Hg38ResourceFiles.
The project root directory contains hmf_code_schema.xml if you want to have it done automatically for this project.

commit.message: DEV-1153: Fix path
